Bjarke Felbo, Alan Mislove, Anders Søgaard, Iyad Rahwan, Sune Lehmann. 2017. Using millions of emoji occurrences to learn any-domain representations for detecting sentiment, emotion and sarcasm. Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing, pages 1615–1625,
